meanings.definition: Feeling or showing extreme discouragement or depression
meanings.sent1: The desponding child sat alone in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent2: She had a desponding expression on her face after receiving the bad news.
meanings.sent3: The desponding cat refused to play with its toys.
meanings.sent4: The desponding sky matched his gloomy mood perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The desponding atmosphere in the room made everyone feel uneasy.
